English TL of set title: The story of a militantly feminist mom on Twitter whose mothercon son breaks her; she becomes his sexual partner, then his lover.

Support official releases.
n: [Artist CG] [Kurose Chiaki] Enjoushita Tsuifyemi Haha ga Mazakon Musuko ni Wakaraserare, Sei Shorigakari wo Hete Koibito ni Naru Hanashi.
